53353.<voice 00420_00053353><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00420_00053353><start_lip_sync n02206 _normal m00001>What the? That light just now...<stop_lip_animation n02206 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53355.<voice 00880_00053355><start_lip_sync c0: <voice 00880_00053355><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>I have returned home.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53356.<voice 01030_00053356><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01030_00053356><start_lip_sync n02206 _normal m00001>P-PRINCESS!! Ooo... Wha-what in the world...<stop_lip_animation n02206 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53358.<voice 01435_00053358><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01435_00053358><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>...Hahah. It seems we managed to cross over into the

53361.<voice 02130_00053361><start_lip_sync n0:

<voice 02350_00053362><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>I'm sorry for worrying you. But it was because of

53363.<voice 02486_00053363><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02486_00053363><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>The Princess has returned, is it true?<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53365.<voice 02815_00053365><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02815_00053365><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>What is it, Lady Lushenda?<stop_lip_animation n02086 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53366.<voice 02985_00053366><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02985_00053366><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>Ever since she went missing during the battle with

53368.<voice 03195_00053368><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03195_00053368><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>King Arios, you'd best listen carefully.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53369.<voice 03235_00053369><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03235_00053369><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>...This Princess Anlucia is not the one we once knew.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53370.<voice 03415_00053370><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03415_00053370><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>She has awakened... Awakened as a Hero, as the

53372.<voice 03710_00053372><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03710_00053372><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>I-I see... If Toma, in the Kingdom of Heaven, could

53425.<voice 03905_00053425><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03905_00053425><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>Come now, let us not be this way! At once, prepare

53374.<center>アンルシア姫が 勇者として\n覚醒を迎えたという報せは\n一夜に:
<center>News of Princess Anlucia's awakening as the Hero
spread throughout the country in a single night.

53375.<center>トーマ王子の死と アンルシア姫の消失に\nふさぎ込んでいた人々は:
<center>The people, grief-stricken by Prince Toma's death
and Anlucia's disappearance, heartily celebrated
the return of the Princess and newly-Awakened Hero.

53376.<center>ある者は歌い ある者は踊り\n人々は 大いに騒いで 歓喜に酔いし:
<center>Some sang, some danced; people were
boisterous and overcome with much joy...

53378.<voice 00100_00053378><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00100_00053378><start_lip_sync n02086 _normal m00001>Up to this point, you have done much to ensure the

53379.<voice 00130_00053379><start_lip_sync n0:

53380.<voice 00191_00053380><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00191_00053380><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>King Arios, allow me to explain.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53381.<voice 00290_00053381><start_lip_sync n0:

53382.<voice 00320_00053382><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00320_00053382><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>At first glance, it appears peaceful, but the Great

53383.<voice 00360_00053383><start_lip_sync n0:

29000618.<voice 00390_29000618><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00390_29000618><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>How about it, <pc>? Will you travel together
with Princess Anlucia throughout Lendersia, in order

53427.<voice 00460_00053427><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00460_00053427><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>I thank you, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n02085 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 00570_00053387><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>I shall leave you with this. It is called the Pendulum of

29000620.<voice 00802_29000620><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00802_29000620><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>However, the Hero, for that very reason, was able to

29000621.<voice 00861_29000621><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00861_29000621><start_lip_sync n02085 _normal m00001>As you travel Lendersia, finding strange phenomena
